trans-unit.source: Lists the options that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object can use to specify white space for the display of a word or punctuation mark.
trans-unit.target: Viser alternativer som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt kan bruke til å angi mellomrom for visning av et ord eller skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: Windows Desktop Speech returns recognized phrases as collections of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText> objects.
trans-unit.target: Windows-skrivebordet tale returnerer gjenkjent uttrykk som samlinger av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: Each object corresponds to a single word or punctuation mark.
trans-unit.target: Hver objektet samsvarer med ett ord eller skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: The `DisplayAttributes` property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText> uses a member of the DisplayAttributes enumeration to describe how print spacing is handled around a given word or punctuation mark.
trans-unit.target: Den `DisplayAttributes` -egenskapen til en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>bruker et medlem av DisplayAttributes-opplisting som beskriver hvordan avstand håndteres rundt et gitt ord eller skilletegn.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: Two or more members of the `DisplayAttributes` enumeration may be combined by a bit-wise `OR` to specify how a particular word should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: To eller flere medlemmer av den `DisplayAttributes` opplisting kan kombineres med en bitvis `OR` til å angi hvordan et bestemt ord skal vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The display formatting that the speech recognizer uses is language specific.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visningen formatering at tale gjenkjenner bruker er språket som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the input phrase to a recognition engine using the default system grammar provided by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar> is "Hello comma he said period".
trans-unit.target: Tenk inndata uttrykket til en recognition motoren bruker standard system grammatikk fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>er "Hello komma han sa periode".</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>

trans-unit.source: Then the recognition engine returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> containing five <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> objects containing the following strings with the following `DisplayAttributes` values.
trans-unit.target: Deretter motoren for recognition returnerer en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>som inneholder fem <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>objekter som inneholder følgende strenger med følgende `DisplayAttributes` verdier.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>

trans-unit.source: |Item|`DisplayAttributes`| |----------|-------------------------| |Hello|OneTrailingSpace| |,|OneTrailingSpace | ConsumeLeadingSpaces| |he|OneTrailingSpace| |said|OneTrailingSpace| |.|OneTrailingSpace | ConsumeLeadingSpaces| The text returned for this recognized phrase is printed as: "Hello, he said."
trans-unit.target: | Elementet | `DisplayAttributes`| |----------|-------------------------| | Hello | OneTrailingSpace | |,| OneTrailingSpace | ConsumeLeadingSpaces | | han | OneTrailingSpace | | SA | OneTrailingSpace | |.| OneTrailingSpace | ConsumeLeadingSpaces | Teksten som ble returnert for dette gjenkjent uttrykket skrives som: "Hello, han sa."

trans-unit.source: The item has no spaces preceding it.
trans-unit.target: Elementet har ingen mellomrom foran den.

trans-unit.source: The item does not specify how white space is handled.
trans-unit.target: Elementet er ikke angitt hvordan mellomrom behandles.

trans-unit.source: The item has one space following it.
trans-unit.target: Elementet har én plass etter seg.

trans-unit.source: The item has two spaces following it.
trans-unit.target: Elementet har to mellomrom etter seg.

trans-unit.source: The item has no spaces following it.
